TopicTitle: Alright boys I need your thought on this one... Bagels...

Articles.Content:
Do you toast your bagel? Or do you not toast your bagel? (or warm?)

Also what kind of bagel do you prefer?

Mine:

-no toasting

-Blueberry

-extra cream cheese

Edited July 28, 2014 by xoknight
Asiago all the way! (warm, but not toasted)
Plain bagel, toasted, with cream cheese.

Well, it depends. If you get them from a local bakery, like you seem to do, you'd just get them straight from the basket -- warm, that is. I like mine poppy with double eggs & cheese (with SPK)

If, on the other hand, you get them from that ####hole that's called Ã¢â‚¬Å“DunkinÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ Donuts,Ã¢â‚¬Â you want them toastedÃ¢â‚¬â€just to cover up the stale taste.

Plain bagel, toasted, with cream cheese.

THIS.

I love plain bagels toasted with cream cheese on them, if I don't have plain though onion will do.

bagel (type irrelevant) + cream cheese = awesome!

actually its pretty hard to screw up a bagel.
Bagel+cream cheese+ some smoked salmon And a pinch of salt, not toasted
Plain (although I had a nice tiger-bread style bagel the other day), toasted, and cream cheese with ham or bacon.

We don't have actual bagels here, but there are things close to it. Cinnamon and raisins for me - a truckload of warm ones, please.

How do you pronounce it?

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2dwM8FV0f7E
Un-toasted, everything bagel with creme cheese.

Everything bagel toasted with butter.

'course that was before gluten turned out to be eating my stomach alive.

I-I never had a bagel before... but I like cream cheese. I also prefer my sandwiches toasted.

I've had a donut, does that count?
I enjoy putting ice-cream on my bagels...
I have warm, asiago cheese bagels with cream cheese in the middle.
Blueberry toasted bagel with butter or Strawberry cream cheese.
Toasted, cream cheese and breaded ham.

actually its pretty hard to screw up a bagel.

Really, try Dunkin' Donuts

The morons also managed once, when I asked for Ã¢â‚¬Å“a bagel with butter on it,Ã¢â‚¬Â to yes, give me a bagel with butter smeared on top of it.
like this?
Warm/Hot but not toasted with butter.
There are no bagels here, we have something similiar called "Kipferl" and looks like this:
toasted, any bagel, with butter/cream cheese/strawberry cream cheese ( strawberry cream cheese can taste great or be really disgusting, depending on the type of bagel.)
Plain, with cream cheese. No, not reproductive cream cheese, but real cream cheese.

Plain, with cream cheese. No, not reproductive cream cheese, but real cream cheese.

Do we even want to know what that is?!?!
Gotta get me that Sweet Cinnamon, toasted to perfection, smothered with cream cheese... Ain't nothing better than that (besides maybe a nice homemade breakfast sandwich)
Onion or the garlic. Toasted with butter and cream cheese.
